channel.title: Help
channel.description: How do i make it so a server that has Ancient Magics: for example Advancedscape v1, make it so that every new player starts with old magic/modern magic. Something to do with setsidebar i think. Anyway, i want it so that it's permanent old magic and is incapable of starting with Ancient Magic. Anyone help? Regards, Cerberus

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

serach for if (magicID == 12939)

then delete everythign up to where it says the last spell (that teleport) delete every bit of text from texhandler.java and delete all the altars

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Z0D14C Z0D14C
item.description:
@Z0D14C wrote:

This server source is Advancedscape, therefore no alter, just a ::switch command, and even if i removed switch command,
which i am going too, i still have new players who start with ancient magic.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

take the ancient altar away. and i think you have to search ancients = 1

and delete everyhting from texthandler.java and the spell id i’ll find out what the first ancient spell id is for you…

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @_pecial §pecial
item.description:
@_pecial wrote:

Oh, Try searching “barrage” then remove everything to do with ancients near that

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Z0D14C Z0D14C
item.description:
@Z0D14C wrote:

Thanks for replying, however this does not help me
Can you tell me what to search, and what to remove, the server allready has fully working old magic, however i don’t want Ancient Magics in the game

Read full topic

Try searching for the interface then delete the modern one

How do i make it so a server that has Ancient Magics: for example Advancedscape v1, make it so that every new player starts with old magic/modern magic.
